name: Mainframe: Hacker Adventures
description:
Roguelike stealth game where you are a computer virus trying to hack the mainframe.

Controls:

W/A/S/D - movement
E - interact (pick files, push buttons, access terminal

Devlog:

https://github.com/naumazeredo/codename-mainframe

made by:
kogyblack (https://github.com/naumazeredo)
skoldpadda

Created from scratch using Odin (http://odin-lang.org/) and SDL2.

We didn't have too much time to complete all the ideas we had (we still need to work to live :/ no music on this one, sadly), it was still very fun to work on it.

We tried to do some Data Oriented design instead of Object Oriented to learn a bit more about it. Not a code masterpiece, but totally a valid experiment to learn more and have a better experience on future jams (maybe code some basic engine or at least some reusable code structure instead of doing everything in jam time).
